title: My art is me (TEFC)
brief_description: A view of children in an experimental nursery school program. Shows them painting, drawing, sewing, mixing playdough, manipulating clay, and constructing wood and scrap sculpture. Explains to teachers the benefits of encouraging creativity rather than providing assignments.
